alert.note: Alert for Falls (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 20 at 5:18PM CDT until April 20 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CDT FOR WEST CENTRAL FALLS COUNTY... At 518 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Lott, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This dangerous storm will be near... Lott around 530 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Pleasant Grove, Durango, Cego, Travis, Mooreville, Chilton, Cedar Springs and Tomlinson Hill. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter now! Get to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building and avoid windows. Heavy rainfall may hide this tornado. Do not wait to see or hear the tornado. TAKE COVER NOW!
